decks.notes: This deck revolves around the combo of Allosaurus Rider and Eldritch Evolution/Neoform to quickly bring out powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Ghalta, Stampede Tyrant. It also utilizes cards like Summoner's Pact and Planar Genesis to search for key pieces and generate value. The inclusion of Veil of Summer provides protection against disruption, while cards like Disciple of Freyalise and Hooting Mandrills help ramp and provide additional value. Overall, the deck aims to assemble its combo pieces quickly and overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and strategies.

The deck focuses on assembling a toolbox of creatures that can synergize with each other to create powerful combo interactions. Using cards like Yawgmoth, Thran Physician and Malevolent Rumble, the deck can generate a lot of value and control the board. Agatha's Soul Cauldron and Grist, the Hunger Tide provide additional ways to generate advantage and control the game. By tutoring for specific creatures with Green Sun's Zenith and utilizing sacrifice synergies, the deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver opponents in a Modern 1 vs 1 setting.

This deck focuses on generating a fast and aggressive board presence by utilizing efficient early game creatures like Territorial Kavu and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer. The deck also aims to disrupt opponents with cards like Stubborn Denial and Leyline Binding while also providing additional support with cards like Teferi, Time Raveler. The inclusion of Leyline of the Guildpact and Scion of Draco helps to boost the power of the deck's creatures, allowing for quick and powerful attacks to overwhelm the opponent before they can establish their own game plan.

This deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with cards to power out cheap and powerful threats like Hollow One and Detective's Phoenix. It utilizes cards like Faithless Looting, Burning Inquiry, and Street Wraith to enable graveyard synergies while also including cards like Lightning Bolt and Tarfire for removal and reach. The strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells while maintaining card advantage through graveyard recursion and card draw effects. The deck aims to end the game quickly before the opponent can stabilize.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly to play powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End. It includes cards that benefit from sacrificing creatures, such as Basking Broodscale and Glaring Fleshraker, and utilizes artifact synergies like Blade of the Bloodchief. The deck also includes control elements with cards like Unholy Heat and Malevolent Rumble to disrupt the opponent's strategy. Overall, the deck aims to create a strong board presence and overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and synergistic combos.

The deck revolves around using a combination of cards that do not require lands to execute powerful combos and disrupt the opponent's strategy. By utilizing cards like Goblin Charbelcher, Lotus Bloom, and Force of Negation, the deck aims to quickly assemble a winning combination while controlling the board with counterspells and removal. The inclusion of cards like Jwari Disruption and Sea Gate Restoration adds versatility to the deck's strategy, allowing for both disruption and card advantage. Overall, the deck focuses on a landless approach to combo and control gameplay in the Modern format.

This deck aims to use various spells to generate mana and card advantage quickly, enabling the player to cast powerful spells like Past in Flames and Glimpse the Impossible multiple times in a turn. Ral, Monsoon Mage provides additional card draw and burn damage, while Grapeshot serves as a finisher. The key strategy involves chaining together spells with the help of Ruby Medallion and other mana accelerants to overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of powerful spells. The deck is focused on creating a storm of spells to quickly defeat the opponent before they can react.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by assembling the UrzaTron lands (Urza's Mine, Urza's Power Plant, Urza's Tower) to generate a large amount of mana and cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Emrakul, the Promised End. The deck also includes control elements like All Is Dust, Ugin, the Eye of the Storms, and Dismember to deal with threats from the opponent. The goal is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while establishing a dominant board presence with big threats.

This aggro deck focuses on quickly establishing a board presence and dealing damage to the opponent. It utilizes a combination of efficient creatures like Territorial Kavu, Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, and Scion of Draco, along with burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Leyline Binding to control the board and finish off opponents. The deck also includes powerful cards like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker to further pressure opponents and close out games. Stubborn Denial provides some protection against removal spells, while Leyline of the Guildpact boosts the deck's overall synergy and efficiency.

This Aggro-Death and Taxes deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan with disruptive creatures like Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd and Emperor of Bones, while also utilizing cards like Ephemerate and Flickerwisp for additional value and tempo. With a mix of removal spells like Fatal Push and Teferi, Time Raveler to deal with threats, as well as powerful finishers like Overlord of the Balemurk and Solitude, this deck aims to apply pressure and control the tempo of the game to secure a victory.

This UW Control deck focuses on utilizing powerful planeswalkers like Narset and Teferi, alongside efficient removal spells and counterspells, to control the game and outvalue opponents. It also includes card draw and selection tools to ensure consistency and find key pieces. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan and protect its own threats, ultimately winning through incremental advantage and resource denial. With a mix of control elements and card advantage engines, this deck seeks to dominate the board and dictate the pace of the game.

The deck focuses on quickly flooding the board with artifact creatures and utilizing artifacts like Mox Opal and Mishra's Bauble to generate mana advantage. Urza's Saga is a key card that can fetch important artifacts like Engineered Explosives or Pinnacle Emissary. Emry, Lurker of the Loch can recur artifacts from the graveyard, providing additional value. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells like Metallic Rebuke and Sink into Stupor. Overall, the strategy is to establish an early board presence and maintain pressure throughout the game.

The main concept of this deck is to use disruption cards to control the opponent's plays while building up mana and card advantage through cards like Lotus Bloom and Whir of Invention. The win condition of the deck revolves around assembling the Goblin Charbelcher combo, using cards like Jwari Disruption and Hydroelectric Specimen to help set it up. The deck aims to be fast and efficient, constantly disrupting the opponent's game plan while setting up its own win condition for a quick victory.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on utilizing low-cost creatures and burn spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent and deal damage efficiently. The deck includes cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Seasoned Pyromancer to generate card advantage and create board presence. With additional support from cards like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Galvanic Discharge, the deck aims to maintain a fast and aggressive strategy. The inclusion of cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Mana Tithe provides additional versatility and disruption to control the pace of the game.

This deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly to play powerful land cards and combo pieces. The goal is to use cards like Amulet of Vigor and Primeval Titan to create big mana advantage and quickly assemble the Amulet Titan combo, which involves bouncing lands and playing additional lands in order to generate more mana and put powerful threats on the battlefield. The deck utilizes lands with powerful abilities and synergies to create a fast and explosive win condition through a combination of land ramp and powerful creatures.

This deck focuses on using mill cards to deplete the opponent's library quickly, while controlling the board with removal spells and disruption. The goal is to mill the opponent out as fast as possible by using cards like Hedron Crab, Ruin Crab, and Fractured Sanity, and then finishing them off with Archive Trap and Thundertrap Trainer. The deck also runs a small number of counterspells and board wipes to handle threats and protect the combo. Surgical Extraction is included to disrupt the opponent's game plan and Path to Exile provides additional removal options.
